review: Very good streaming usb stick plus the included remote control. No need to download app to control the unit.
author: Kerwin S. Patrimonio

review: My biggest disappointment is that Comcast Xfinity is not one of the cable companies listed to set up HBO Go.  I pay for HBO and I assumed I would be able to access it on the TV that I do not have On Demand and I can't.
author: Audrey Hyland

review: We love our Fire TV stick.  It is easy to use and there are endless possibilities for watching movies, TV shows etc.
author: Michelle J

review: I got this because it carried the WWE Network and google chrome does not. Turns out the Amazon Firestick is way more then i thought it was. From Netflix to family games to music and even cable networks. It is so easy to use that i was able to teach my Grandmother and 7yr old brother how to use it in 2 Minutes.
author: Jesus

review: Love it!  It can occasionally slow down and needs a reset but for the price I cannot complain. 99% of the time it works flawlessly. Highly recommend.
author: Bob Correia

review: Wasn't too impressed. Netflix crashes a lot or won't load. And about every ten minutes the stick itself cuts out for a second....
author: Hugh J Parman
